meanings.sent1: She recommenced her painting after a short break.
meanings.sent2: The teacher recommenced the lesson after the interruption.
meanings.sent3: The cat recommenced chasing its tail, much to the amusement of the children.
meanings.sent4: The sun recommenced its journey across the sky, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The engine recommenced its steady hum, filling the room with a comforting sound.

meanings.sent1: He recommenced his workout routine to get back in shape.

meanings.sent3: The robot recommenced its dance routine, causing laughter among the audience.
meanings.sent4: The river recommenced its flow after the dam was opened, bringing life to the valley.
meanings.sent5: The clock recommenced ticking, marking the passage of time in the quiet room.
